77 inline const i2d::CVector2d& CPolypoint::GetPoint(int index) const
78 {
79  Q_ASSERT(index >= 0 && index < int(m_points.size()));
80 
81  return m_points[index];
82 }
83 
84 inline int CPolypoint::GetPointsCount() const
85 {
86  return int(m_points.size());
87 }
88 
89 inline void CPolypoint::Insert(const i2d::CVector2d& vector)
90 {
91  m_points.push_back(vector);
92 }
93 
94 
95 inline void CPolypoint::Clear()
96 {
97  m_points.clear();
98 }
99 
100 
101 inline const QVector<i2d::CVector2d>& CPolypoint::GetPoints() const
102 {
103  return m_points;
104 }
